alert.note: Alert for Camas (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 14 at 12:03PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Idaho, including the following county, Camas. * WHEN...Until 400 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1150 AM MDT, emergency management reported minor flooding south of Fairfield. With warmer temperatures this weekend, sheet flooding will expand in the Camas Prairie. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
